summary: A little girl's body gets eerily possessed by a criminal's soul to get revenge on some of his former criminal friends.
cast: Ashok Kumar|Feroz Khan|Reena Roy|Prem Chopra|Baby Pinky|Prem Nath|Kanhaiyalal Chaturvedi|Leela Mishra|Ramesh Deo|K.N. Singh|Mukri|V.D. Puranik|Pandey|Vijaya Bhanu|Madhu Apte|Munni|Agha|Aruna Irani|Jagdeep|Jeevan|Mehmood Jr.|Polson|Anusheel Nagaich
title: Jadu Tona
